title: Vaishnavi Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram
materials: Platinum base intricately studded with brilliant-cut diamonds (approx. 1.66ct Dwt of 368 diamonds) and 15.01ct of rich
deep green emeralds. Features meticulously crafted settings ensuring durability. Platinum weight 85.400 Grwt.
features: This captivating Haaram features a graduating design, starting with smaller diamond and emerald motifs that increase in size towards the center. Features rectangular emeralds bordered with dazzling diamonds, interspaced with diamond floral designs, creating a cascading waterfall effect. Contemporary design elements are infused with traditional South Indian inspiration for a timeless appeal.
colors: The color palette is dominated by the icy brilliance of diamonds and the lush green of the emeralds. The platinum base offers a cool
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: This Vaishnavi Emerald and Diamond Haaram is a stunning blend of traditional grandeur and modern elegance. The use of platinum, a durable and precious metal, ensures lasting beauty. Emeralds are the stone of prosperity and good fortune. Owning this piece speaks to your refined taste and appreciation for exquisite craftsmanship.
